192  void Load(const char *filename, const char *fmt = "txt") {
193  eternity::xml_archive fa;
194  fa.open(filename, eternity::archive::load);
195  xml_serialize(fa, "");
196  fa.close();
197  }

199  void Save(const char *filename, const char *fmt = "txt") {
200  eternity::xml_archive fa;
201  fa.open(filename, eternity::archive::store);
202  xml_serialize(fa, "");
203  fa.close();
204  }
205 
206  void xml_serialize(eternity::xml_archive& xml, const char* prefix) {
207  char buffer[1024];
208 
209  if (xml.is_loading()) {
210  unsigned int sz = 0;
211  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.sz", prefix);
212  xml.read(buffer, sz, 0);
213  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mChannels", prefix);
214  xml.read(buffer, mChannels, 0);
215  DelPoints(sz);
216  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < sz; i++) {
217  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mBuffer.%d", prefix, i);
218  AddPoint();
219  DVECTOR_XML_SERIALIZE(*(mBuffer.back()), xml, buffer);
220  }
221 
222  } else {
223  unsigned int sz = mBuffer.size();
224  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.sz", prefix);
225  xml.write(buffer, sz);
226  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mChannels", prefix);
227  xml.write(buffer, mChannels);
228  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < sz; i++) {
229  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mBuffer.%d", prefix, i);
230  DVECTOR_XML_SERIALIZE(*mBuffer[i], xml, buffer);
231  }
232  }
233  }
